summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Sixty-fifth Street, from Seventeenth Avenue Northeast to Twenty-second Avenue Northeast; Twentieth Avenue Northeast, Twenty-first Avenue Northeast and Twenty-second Avenue Northeast, through University Place Addition to the City of Seattle, from East Sixty-fifth Street to the south line of said University Place Addition to the City of Seattle, by laying water mains therein, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other necessary appurtenances, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 33692 and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
